name: Historical-Photo100
postCreateCommand: python -m venv .venv && . .venv/bin/activate && python -m pip install --upgrade pip && python -m pip install torch torchvision torchaudio --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cpu && python -m pip install basicsr realesrgan opencv-python numpy pillow gfpgan customtkinter scikit-image lpips pytorch-fid matplotlib scipy requests diffusers transformers accelerate safetensors huggingface_hub
